name: scr-deck-builder
description: Deck building system for Sorcery: Contested Realm card game

scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/data && cp -R src/data/raw dist/data/ && node dist/data/processed/processCards.js
scripts.build:force: tsc --skipLibCheck || true; mkdir -p dist/data && cp -R src/data/raw dist/data/ && node dist/data/processed/processCards.js
scripts.build:nocheck: tsc --skipLibCheck --noEmitOnError false && mkdir -p dist/data && cp -R src/data/raw dist/data/ && node dist/data/processed/processCards.js
scripts.system:status: node -e "const config = require('./dist/config'); console.log('Using optimized system')"
